spec_data.Name: perl-String-Dirify
spec_data.Description:
This module allows you to convert a string (possibly containing high ASCII
characters, and even HTML) into another, lower-cased, string which can be
used as a directory name.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:05:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Convert a string into a directory name
